channel.title: Tech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Tech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: TikTok finalizes deal to create new US entity and avoid ban
item.description: The deal ends a six-year long political saga that that started in 2020 when President Donald Trump tried to ban the app over national security concern...

item.title: TikTok-like microdramas are going to make billions this year, even though they kind of suck
item.description: The business model behind these apps replicates the same dark patterns as mobile games.

item.title: OpenAI chief Sam Altman plans India visit as AI leaders converge in New Delhi: sources
item.description: Sam Altman is set for his first India visit in nearly a year.

item.title: This startup will send 1,000 people’s ashes to space — affordably — in 2027
item.description: Started by an engineer who worked on the space shuttle program, and at Blue Origin, Space Beyond has a spot on a 2027 Falcon 9 flight.

item.title: 149 Million Usernames and Passwords Exposed by Unsecured Database
item.description: This “dream wish list for criminals” includes millions of Gmail, Facebook, banking logins, and more. The researcher who discovered it suspects they we...

item.title: Microsoft gave FBI a set of BitLocker encryption keys to unlock suspects’ laptops: reports
item.description: The FBI served Microsoft a warrant requesting encryption recovery keys to decrypt the hard drives of people involved in an alleged fraud case in Guam.

item.title: Roborock Qrevo Curv 2 Flow Review: The Most Beautiful, Best Robot Vacuum
item.description: Roborock hasn’t updated its popular, affordable Qrevo Curv line of robovacs for years. Finally, it’s happening!

item.title: No, the Freecash App Won’t Pay You to Scroll TikTok
item.description: Freecash will actually pay money out to users but not for watching videos. This misleading marketing coincides with the app’s rising popularity.

item.title: $30 Off Chewy Promo Codes | January 2026
item.description: Explore Chewy coupon codes for $30 off, $20 off your first order $49, 50% off pet food, and more January 2026 discounts.

item.title: We Are Rewind GB-001 Cassette Boombox: Old-School Stylish
item.description: We Are Rewind’s speaker/cassette player combo is an imperfect but satisfying reissue of a bygone audio era.
